product.title: NUISISA 2 in 1 Rotating Curling Iron Fast Heat PTC Hair Straightener and Curler
product.description: Hair Straightener and Curler:Girls' hairstyles are always changeable, sometimes playful and lively, sometimes fresh and refined. This styler can help you create vertical straight hair or charming curly hair. You will make favourite hairstyle everyday.
product.description_html: Hair Straightener and Curler:Girls' hairstyles are always changeable, sometimes playful and lively, sometimes fresh and refined. This styler can help you create vertical straight hair or charming curly hair. You will make favourite hairstyle everyday.
product.description_full:
Hair Straightener and Curler:Girls' hairstyles are always changeable, sometimes playful and lively, sometimes fresh and refined. This styler can help you create vertical straight hair or charming curly hair. You will make favourite hairstyle everyday. * 2 Rows of Combs:This styler has 2 rows of temperature-resistant combs. The design of the combs is similar to that of normal hair combs, making it easy to get started. The comb teeth are reasonably spaced, so you can easily comb the end to solve the problem of hair knotting.
 * Temperature Settings: 3-level temperature adjustment fully considers the needs of different hair types. 230°F is suitable for soft and damaged hair, 320°F is for normal and sofa hair, 392°F is for hard and natural curls. You can switch different temperature by pressing the button.
 * Floating Panel: The floating panel can automatically adjust the strength according to the volume of hair, reducing hair damage caused by pulling. The panel can always keep the upper and lower panels in close contact, and evenly heated without damaging the hair fiber.
 * Styler Material: The whole body adopts the process of baking varnish, which is thick and bright, wear-resistant, and not easy to fade. It ensures the safety performance and longevity of use. The handle is non-slip with aesthetic ergonomics and comfortable grip.
product.description_full_html:
Hair Straightener and Curler:Girls' hairstyles are always changeable, sometimes playful and lively, sometimes fresh and refined. This styler can help you create vertical straight hair or charming curly hair. You will make favourite hairstyle everyday.
  • 2 Rows of Combs:This styler has 2 rows of temperature-resistant combs. The design of the combs is similar to that of normal hair combs, making it easy to get started. The comb teeth are reasonably spaced, so you can easily comb the end to solve the problem of hair knotting.
  • Temperature Settings: 3-level temperature adjustment fully considers the needs of different hair types. 230°F is suitable for soft and damaged hair, 320°F is for normal and sofa hair, 392°F is for hard and natural curls. You can switch different temperature by pressing the button.
  • Floating Panel: The floating panel can automatically adjust the strength according to the volume of hair, reducing hair damage caused by pulling. The panel can always keep the upper and lower panels in close contact, and evenly heated without damaging the hair fiber.
  • Styler Material: The whole body adopts the process of baking varnish, which is thick and bright, wear-resistant, and not easy to fade. It ensures the safety performance and longevity of use. The handle is non-slip with aesthetic ergonomics and comfortable grip.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
